message.content:
Hi!

The phrases "Hello" and "Hi" are two ways of greeting someone. "Hello" conveys politeness and formality, while "Hi" is more casual.

When you write "Hello," you expect a formal greeting in return, such as "how do you do?" or "how are you?" On the other hand, if you use "Hi," you can expect a more informal greeting like "hey" or "yo."_knowledgefromthetext_
